directions: Cut the cabbage into 8 wedges, and remove the core. Place all the wedges on a piece of aluminum foil large enough to wrap the cabbage. Season to taste with garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Seal cabbage in the foil.
Grill for 30 to 40 minutes on the preheated grill, until tender.
ingredients: 1 ½ teaspoons garlic powder, or to taste
title: Cabbage on the Grill
